mapper.select: select * from day_lesson where lesson_no=#{lessonNo} order by day_lesson_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into day_lesson(lesson_no, lesson_date, lesson_start_hr, lesson_end_hr, lesson_summ, lesson_eval) values(#{lessonNo}, #{lessonDate}, #{lessonStartHour}, #{lessonEndHour}, #{lessonSummary}, #{lessonEvaluation})
mapper.update: update day_lesson set lesson_date=#{lessonDate}, lesson_start_hr=#{lessonStartHour}, lesson_end_hr=#{lessonEndHour}, lesson_summ=#{lessonSummary}, lesson_eval=#{lessonEvaluation} where day_lesson_no=#{dayLessonNo}
